title: Key plan or location plan-A Key plan drawn to a scale of not less than 1: 4000 shall be submitted along with the application in Appendix II for development permission and commencement certificate showing the boundary, location of the site with respect to neighborhood land-marks
clause_text: Key plan or location plan-A Key plan drawn to a scale of not less than 1: 4000 shall be submitted along with the application in Appendix II for development permission and commencement certificate showing the boundary, location of the site with respect to neighborhood land-marks.
